3 #include <cmath>
4 #include <iostream>
5 #include <sensor_msgs/Imu.h>
6 #include <sensor_msgs/NavSatFix.h>
7 #include <sensor_msgs/NavSatStatus.h>
8 #include <webots/utils/AnsiCodes.hpp>

10 namespace twizy_webots {
11 
12 Piksi::Piksi(webots::Supervisor &supervisor, ros::NodeHandle &nh,
13  ros::NodeHandle &nh_private, std::string position)
14  : gps_(supervisor.getGPS(position + "_piksi_gnss")),
15  accelerometer_(
16  supervisor.getAccelerometer(position + "_piksi_accelerometer")),
17  gyro_(supervisor.getGyro(position + "_piksi_gyro")),
18  origin_(llh_to_utm_point(57.70716, 11.96679, 10.0)),
19  position_(position) {
20 
21  std::cout << "Initializing " << position << " Piksi GNSS and IMU\n";
22 
23  // Read required ROS parameters
24  if (!nh_private.getParam("piksi/gyro/cov", gyro_cov_) ||
25  !nh_private.getParam("piksi/accelerometer/cov", accelerometer_cov_) ||
26  !nh_private.getParam("piksi/gnss/cov", gnss_cov_)) {
27  std::cout << webots::AnsiCodes::RED_FOREGROUND
28  << "Required ROS parameters missing"
29  << webots::AnsiCodes::RESET << std::endl;
30  return;
31  }
32 
33  // Constant hard coded update rates
34  double imu_ups = 100.0;
35  double gnss_ups = 10.0;
36 
37  // Enable sensors
38  gps_->enable(round(1000.0 / gnss_ups));
39  accelerometer_->enable(round(1000.0 / imu_ups));
40  gyro_->enable(round(1000.0 / imu_ups));
41 
42  pub_imu_ =
43  nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::Imu>("/piksi/" + position + "/imu/raw", 1);
44  pub_gnss_ = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::NavSatFix>(
45  "/piksi/" + position + "/gnss/fix", 1);
46 
47  imu_update_timer_ =
48  nh.createTimer(ros::Duration(1.0 / imu_ups), &Piksi::imu_update, this);
49  gnss_update_timer_ = nh.createTimer(ros::Duration(1.0 / gnss_ups),
50  &Piksi::gnss_update, this);
51 }
52 
53 geodesy::UTMPoint Piksi::llh_to_utm_point(double lat, double lon,
54  double altitude) {
55  geographic_msgs::GeoPoint llh;
56  llh.latitude = lat;
57  llh.longitude = lon;
58  llh.altitude = altitude;
59  geodesy::UTMPoint utm(llh);
60  return utm;
61 }
62 
63 void Piksi::imu_update(const ros::TimerEvent &evt) {
64  // Webots will return NaNs at the beginning of the simulation, don't bother
65  // with those
66  if (std::isnan(accelerometer_->getValues()[0]) ||
67  std::isnan(accelerometer_->getValues()[1]) ||
68  std::isnan(accelerometer_->getValues()[2]) ||
69  std::isnan(gyro_->getValues()[0]) ||
70  std::isnan(gyro_->getValues()[1]) ||
71  std::isnan(gyro_->getValues()[2])) {
72  return;
73  }
74 
75  sensor_msgs::Imu imu;
76  imu.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
77  imu.header.frame_id = position_ + "_piksi_imu";
78  imu.orientation_covariance[0] = -1;
79  imu.angular_velocity.x = gyro_->getValues()[0];
80  imu.angular_velocity.y = gyro_->getValues()[1];
81  imu.angular_velocity.z = gyro_->getValues()[2];
82  imu.angular_velocity_covariance = {gyro_cov_, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, gyro_cov_,
83  0.0, 0.0, 0.0, gyro_cov_};
84  imu.linear_acceleration.x = accelerometer_->getValues()[0];
85  imu.linear_acceleration.y = accelerometer_->getValues()[1];
86  imu.linear_acceleration.z = accelerometer_->getValues()[2];
87  imu.linear_acceleration_covariance = {accelerometer_cov_, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0,
88  accelerometer_cov_, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0,
89  accelerometer_cov_};
90 
91  pub_imu_.publish(imu);
92 }
93 
94 void Piksi::gnss_update(const ros::TimerEvent &evt) {
95  // Webots will return NaNs at the beginning of the simulation, don't bother
96  // with those
97  if (std::isnan(gps_->getValues()[0]) || std::isnan(gps_->getValues()[1]) ||
98  std::isnan(gps_->getValues()[2])) {
99  return;
100  }
101 
102  sensor_msgs::NavSatFix fix;
103  fix.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
104  fix.header.frame_id = position_ + "_piksi_gnss";
105  fix.status.service = sensor_msgs::NavSatStatus::SERVICE_GALILEO;
106  fix.status.status = sensor_msgs::NavSatStatus::STATUS_FIX;
107  fix.position_covariance = {gnss_cov_, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, gnss_cov_,
108  0.0, 0.0, 0.0, gnss_cov_};
109  fix.position_covariance_type =
110  sensor_msgs::NavSatFix::COVARIANCE_TYPE_APPROXIMATED;
111  if (gps_->getCoordinateSystem() == webots::GPS::WGS84) {
112  // GPS' in Webots reports LLH values directly (this is controlled via a
113  // Webots world property)
114  fix.latitude = gps_->getValues()[0];
115  fix.longitude = gps_->getValues()[1];
116  fix.altitude = gps_->getValues()[2];
117  } else {
118  // GPS' in Webots reports Cartesian coordinates
119  geodesy::UTMPoint utm(gps_->getValues()[2] + origin_.easting,
120  gps_->getValues()[0] + origin_.northing,
121  gps_->getValues()[1] + origin_.altitude,
122  origin_.zone, origin_.band);
123  geographic_msgs::GeoPoint geo = geodesy::toMsg(utm);
124  fix.latitude = geo.latitude;
125  fix.longitude = geo.longitude;
126  fix.altitude = geo.altitude;
127  }
128 
129  pub_gnss_.publish(fix);
130 }
131 
132 Piksi::~Piksi() {
133  gps_.reset();
134  accelerometer_.reset();
135  gyro_.reset();
136 }
